jchess.gui.presenter.gamewindow

Class GamePresenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.inject.AbstractModule
      • jchess.gui.presenter.gamewindow.GamePresenter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.inject.Module, IPresenter, IViewClosedListener, IGameListener, IGamePresenter, IGameViewListener

    public final class GamePresenter
extends com.google.inject.AbstractModule
implements IGamePresenter
    This is class is responsible to show or load Game window with the help of model and presenter.
    Since:
    7 Dec 2019
    Author:
    Sajad Karim
